abouts.title: Frontend Development
abouts.description: Experienced in handling project in scope of research and web development as a frontend developer. I have basic knowledge on Laravel framework, Vue JS, Angular, React JS, Tailwind or Bootstrap CSS, and Jquery to build an Website.

abouts.title: User Experience
abouts.description: Individuals who express a keen interest in the realm of User Experience (UX) within the context of website development dedicate their efforts to the creation of an optimal, efficient, and gratifying user experience.

abouts.title: Web Design
abouts.description: I find joy in the process of creating captivating, responsive user interfaces that cater to user needs. Creativity, a grasp of design principles, and proficiency in graphic design tools are key characteristics of individuals who enjoy in web design.
